statements: DELETE FROM inspections WHERE inspector_id = 5 AND inspection_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM defects WHERE timestamp < current_timestamp - interval '1 day';
DELETE FROM product_details WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Inc';
DELETE FROM quality_control_data WHERE id = 1 AND defect_rate > 0.05;
DELETE FROM product_details WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Inc.' OR category = 'Electronics';
DELETE FROM inspections WHERE defect_id = 1 AND inspection_date > '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM defect_rates WHERE defect_percentage > 5.00 AND report_date < '2021-06-01';
